Package codebrains.crazysellout.AsyncTasks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttemptAddProduct
    Async class that handles the send and receive of data for the add product process.
    AttemptCreateAccount
    AsyncTask is a seperate thread than the thread that runs the GUI Any type of networking should be done with asynctask.
    AttemptCustomizationOfProduct
    Async class that handles the send of data product data for the update / delete product process.
    AttemptDeleteFavorite
    Async class that handles the send of favorite product data to the server in order to delete the register from the database.
    AttemptDisplayFavorites
    Async class that handles the receive of favorite products from the database in order to be displayed to the user.
    AttemptDisplayProducts
    Async class that handles the receive of data products from database in order to be displayed to the user.
    AttemptDisplayUserProducts
    Async class that handles the receive of user products (products added by the producer-user) from the database in order to be displayed to him.
    AttemptLogin
    Async class that handles the send and receive of data for the login process.
    AttemptRetrieveProducts
    Async class that handles the receive of products from the database.
    AttemptToAddFavorite
    Async class that handles the send of data to the remote server in order to add a new product into the database.
    AttemptToDeleteAccount
    Async class that handles the send of data to the remote server in order to delete the users account.
    AttemptToRetrieveUserInfo
    Async class that handles the send / get of data from server for the purpose of displaying the user info to the user's profile.
    AttemptUpdateAccount
    Async class that handles the update of user's account.
